translations: 杀害（slay 的过去式）；（使）突然转向，急转；（使）侧滑；打滑；猛拐；（电子仪表）旋转
大量，许多；猛烈的侧转，回转；沼地

sentences.sentence: There have been a whole slew of shooting incidents.
sentences.translation: 已经发生过大量枪击案。

sentences.sentence: The book says, "Then with one back-handed stroke he slew poor Guy of Guisborne."
sentences.translation: 书中说：“然后他反手一击，他就把可怜的戈次勃恩的至友刺死了。”
